definition[0]: to move smoothly and quietly, as if without effort
example[0]: couples gliding over the dance floor
definition[1]: if a bird glides, it flies without moving its wings
definition[2]: if a plane glides, it flies without using an engine
definition[3]: to do or achieve things easily
example[1]: Kennedy seemed to glide through life.
definition[4]: a smooth quiet movement that seems to take no effort
definition[5]: the act of moving from one musical note to another without a break in sound
definition[6]: a vowel which is made by moving your tongue from one position to another
